## Time Series Forecasting

R                        | Python
-------------------------|-------------------------
[fable](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/fable/index.html)-Forecasting Models for Tidy Time Series | [statsmodels](https://www.statsmodels.org/devel/user-guide.html#time-series-analysis)- Statistics based models
[forecast](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/forecast/index.html)- Forecasting Functions for Time Series and Linear Models | [sktime](https://www.sktime.org/en/latest/)- A unified framework for machine learning with time series
$\text{}$ | [GluonTS](https://ts.gluon.ai/)- Deep learning-based models.
